snippet: Chobani, which has rapidly become a billion-dollar powerhouse in an expanding market, is about to open one of the world’s largest yogurt processing plants in Twin Falls, Idaho.
abstract: Chobani, yogurt company that grew to roughly $1 billion powerhouse in just five years, will formally open one of the world's largest yogurt-processing plants in Twin Falls, Idaho.
lead_paragraph: Chobani, which has rapidly become a billion-dollar powerhouse in an expanding market, is about to open one of the world’s largest yogurt processing plants in Twin Falls, Idaho.

headline.seo: Chobani to Open Huge Yogurt Factory in Idaho
headline.main: U.S. Hunger for Yogurt Leads to Gigantic Factory
headline.print_headline: U.S. Hunger for Yogurt Leads to Gigantic Factory
